This journey includes walking the Labyrinth, The Medicine Wheel.Labyrinths are used world-wide as a way to quiet the mind, calm anxieties, recover balance in life, enhance creativity and encourage meditation, insight, self-reflection and stress reduction. The practice of labyrinth walking integrates the body with the mind and spirit. The Medicine Wheel exist to remind us of our connection to All things "Mitakuye Oyasin" (We are all related). Walking the Medicine Wheel brings us to various positions of the wheel that will assist us on our healing journey as we continue this "Life Walk" in this realm. If it is past hurts that one seeks to heal, guidance for the path ahead or a deeper connection with this planet and all its inhabitants... walking the Medicine Wheel will help with the healing journey!Read more - You'll return to the starting point + - Buy it with Top rated Medicine Wheel & Labyrinth Healing Journey provided by Earthy Wombman Healing Journeys Product Overview: Medicine Wheel & Labyrinth Healing Journey Prices From |$135|
